definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: yan2 zhong4 ji2 xing4 hu1 xi1 xi4 tong3 zong1 he2 zheng4
containing_words.word: 严重急性呼吸系统综合症

pinyin: ji2 xing4 qing2 hua4 wu4 zhong1 du2

sentences.english: Tom is a short fuse, he has bad temper.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆是个急性子，脾气不好。

sentences.english: The experiment of acute poisonousness showed it was non-poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 急性毒性实验显示其无毒。

sentences.english: Objective To treat acute myocardial infarction with cardiogenic shock by emegency PCI.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨急性心肌梗死合并心源性休克的抢救方法。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The Tongbi capsule has inhibitory effect on acute and immune inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 通鼻胶囊具有对抗急性及免疫性炎症的作用。

sentences.english: The short-tempered bird flew away to the sky.

sentences.chinese: 临床上往往伴发急性膀胱炎。

sentences.english: A typical quick temper, and work is rash, almost not pass through the brain.
sentences.chinese: 一个典型的急性子，做事也很鲁莽，几乎不经过大脑。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effective therapy of acute injury of lung caused by indirect cause morbi.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨间接病因致急性肺损伤的治疗。

sentences.english: Conclusion Moxibustion therapy is an effective method for acute gouty arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 结论中医灸法治疗痛风性关节炎急性期疗效确切。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the effect of Jipailin on blood rheology in acute stage in cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨吉派林对脑梗死急性期血液流变学的影响。

sentences.english: Diagnosis of acute infection is often missed because the infected person has no symtoms.
sentences.chinese: 由于被感染者无症状，对急性感染经常无法及时确诊。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis of subacute pituitary apoplexy and evaluate the surgical results.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨亚急性垂体卒中的诊断及评价手术治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the curative effect of hemoperfusion for acute drug poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血液灌流对急性药物中毒的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Desensitized patients are at high risk of developing acute antibody-mediated rejection.
sentences.chinese: 致敏患者有发生急性抗体介导的排斥反应的高度危险。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the pathomorphological characteristics of acute bromadiolone poisoning in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察豚鼠食人溴敌隆急性中毒的病理形态学特点。

sentences.english: Objective To study the acute effects of talc instillation intrapleurally.
sentences.chinese: 研究胸腔内注入滑石粉浆的急性反应。

definition: slow and patient/chronic (disease)/slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)
